summary: A command‑line utility that transforms original Latent Diffusion Model (LDM) checkpoint files into the format expected by the Hugging Face Diffusers library, rebuilding the UNet, VQ‑VAE, and scheduler components and writing a new checkpoint.
business_intent: Provide a straightforward way for developers and researchers to reuse existing LDM pretrained weights within the Diffusers ecosystem, facilitating deployment, fine‑tuning, and integration with other Diffusers pipelines.
